name: RefileRequestService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Refile Request API Service

scripts.deploy-development: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_development.env -S config/event_sources_development.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 -P nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-development-vpc: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_development.env -S config/event_sources_development.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 -a $aws_access_key_id_development -s $aws_secret_access_key_development -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution
scripts.deploy-production-vpc: ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -b subnet-59bcdd03,subnet-5deecd15 -g sg-116eeb60 -a $aws_access_key_id_production -s $aws_secret_access_key_production
